name: Into the Radius
summary:
ATTENTION, EXPLORERS!
If you want to go the extra mile to support the Into the Radius team, you can now purchase the optional Camo Supporter Pack.
This pack includes PM, AKS-74U, IZh-81, OTs-33, and Mosin-Nagant camouflage patterns.
Thank you for all the love and support!

An atmospheric open-world single-player survival shooter.

You find yourself in the middle of the blighted zone, cut from the outside world. Your guns and your wits are all you have left. Fight the deadly enemies, dodge dangerous...
